info.title: Smart Configurator Introduction
Introduction of Smart Configurator for RX family
info.description: This video introduces the Smart Configurator for the RX family.

info.title: How to Create a Smart Configurator project in e² studio
info.description: This video demonstrates how to create a Smart Configurator project in e² studio.

info.title: Smart Configurator Tutorial - How to use potentiometer to control LED with RX family
info.description: This video demonstrates how to create a program that uses the potentiometer to control the LED.

info.title: Smart Configurator Tutorial - Create a LED blinking program using RX Family MCU
info.description: This video shows how to create a LED blinking program by using the Compare Match Timer (CMT) in Smart Configurator.

info.title: How to Use the Smart Configurator and FIT Modules with IAR EW for RX
Easy Download of Missing FIT Modules in Your Imported Project
info.description: This video introduces a feature for easy download of missing FIT modules in your imported project. By using this feature, you can download all the missing FIT modules with just one click.

info.title: Smart Configurator Feature - Easy selection of software components for Renesas boards
info.description: Most Renesas boards provide several features for developing applications on Renesas microcontroller. To assist the development of these applications, Smart configurator now includes a new functionality for selecting suitable software for each of these board features. This video will demonstrate this new functionality using the Renesas Starter Kit+ for RX671.

info.title: Smart Configurator Tips - How to display pre-downloaded FIT modules in Smart Configurator
info.description: This video shows how to display pre-downloaded FIT modules in Smart Configurator.

info.title: SNOOZE Mode Sequencer (SMS) Tutorial (1/3) - Create Project for RL78/G23
info.description: This video demonstrates how to use the SNOOZE mode sequencer (SMS) of RL78/G23 to build a power supply monitoring system in e² studio.

info.title: SNOOZE Mode Sequencer (SMS) Tutorial (2/3) - Configure Project for RL78/G23
info.description: This video demonstrates how to use the SNOOZE mode sequencer (SMS) of RL78/G23 to build a power supply monitoring system in e² studio.

info.title: SNOOZE Mode Sequencer (SMS) Tutorial (3/3) - Add User Code and Run Project for RL78/G23
info.description: This video demonstrates how to use the SNOOZE mode sequencer (SMS) of RL78/G23 to build a power supply monitoring system in e² studio.

info.title: Using Smart Configurator with IAR Embedded Workbench for RL78 (1/2) - Installation
info.description: This video demonstrates how to install IAR Embedded Workbench for RL78 and Smart Configurator.

info.title: Using Smart Configurator with IAR Embedded Workbench for RL78 (2/2) - Creating an EWB Project for Smart Configurator
info.description: This video demonstrates how to create an Embedded Workbench project collaborates with Smart Configurator.

info.title: Smart Configurator Feature - Easy Transfer of Component Settings from One Project to Another
info.description: This video demonstrates how to transfer component settings from one project to another when using Smart Configurator.

info.title: How to use FIT samples using Smart Configurator in e² studio
info.description: This video shows how to use the sample projects bundled with FIT modules using Smart Configurator in e² studio.

info.title: Easy Coding in e² studio With the Smart Configurator Developer Assistance Feature
info.description: This video introduces the Smart Configurator Developer Assistance feature that helps you code with ease, improving software development efficiency.

info.title: Getting started for FreeRTOS IoT using Smart Configurator in e2 studio
info.description: This video shows how to use Smart Configurator in e² studio for FreeRTOS IoT.

info.title: Getting started for Azure RTOS using Smart Configurator in e2 studio
info.description: This video shows how to use Smart Configurator in e2 studio for Azure RTOS.

info.title: How to Use the User Code Protection Feature in Smart Configurator
info.description: This video shows how to use the “User code protection feature” in Smart Configurator.

info.title: Getting Started for Azure RTOS Using RX Smart Configurator with IAR Embedded Workbench
info.description: This video shows how to use RX Smart Configurator with IAR Embedded Workbench for the Azure RTOS project.

info.title: Smart Configurator Feature - How to generate HEX values for Code Generator drivers
info.description: This video demonstrates how to use the Smart Configurator feature to generate HEX values for Code Generator drivers.

info.title: RX Smart Configurator for Motor (1/3) - Create a Motor Project
info.description: This demonstration guides the user to create a RX motor control project using Smart Configurator in the e² studio environment.

info.title: RX Smart Configurator for Motor (2/3) - Add User Code
info.description: This demonstration guides the user to create a RX motor control project using Smart Configurator in the e² studio environment.

info.title: RX Smart Configurator for Motor (3/3) - Run Motor Project
info.description: This demonstration guides the user to create a RX motor control project using Smart Configurator in the e² studio environment.

info.title: ELCL Slave Select Pin Function (4-wire SPI) Tutorial (1/3) - Create project for RL78/G23
info.description: This video demonstrates how to use e² studio to enable RL78 Logic and Event Link Controller (ELCL) function to add Slave Selection (SS) to the slave receive mode of a Serial Array Unit's (SAU) 3-wire serial I/O (CSI) and achieve 4-wire SPI (Serial Peripheral Interface) communication.

info.title: ELCL Slave Select Pin Function (4-wire SPI) Tutorial (2/3) - Configuration Project RL78/G23
info.description: This video demonstrates how to use e² studio to enable RL78 Logic and Event Link Controller (ELCL) function to add Slave Selection (SS) to the slave receive mode of a Serial Array Unit's (SAU) 3-wire serial I/O (CSI) and achieve 4-wire SPI (Serial Peripheral Interface) communication.

info.title: ELCL Slave Select Pin Function (4-wire SPI) Tutorial (3/3) - Add user code and run project for RL78/G23
info.description: This video demonstrates how to use e² studio to enable RL78 Logic and Event Link Controller (ELCL) function to add Slave Selection (SS) to the slave receive mode of a Serial Array Unit's (SAU) 3-wire serial I/O (CSI) and achieve 4-wire SPI (Serial Peripheral Interface) communication.

info.title: SNOOZE Mode Sequencer (SMS) Tutorial - Import SMS LED Blinking Dimming Control Project
info.description: This video demonstrates how to control LEDs using the SNOOZE mode sequencer and the 32-bit interval timer for RL78/G23 device.

info.title: How to download SMS Assembler for RL78
info.description: This video demonstrates how to install the SMS Assembler, which is used to compile the RL78/G23 SNOOZE Mode Sequencer (SMS) program.
